channel.title: Windows vista client out there?
channel.description: hey whenever i use a client (ive tried like 10) they open up the black box and close quickly on vista, but when i use it on a xp at my friends house it works fine is there a client based for vista? or is it just my computer.

item.title: Windows vista client out there?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Basically what CJ said. Just go to http://www.java.com and update it. My friend had this problem. Then he updated.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows vista client out there?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

It’s your java, download jdk and jre, and set up your environment variables.

It doesn’t matter what windows operating system you have, it just matters whether your java is set up correctly.

Read full topic
